explanation: [0-0] Inside an old building, a boy in a gray coat and blue pants is standing on the right side. Behind him is a red brick wall with a gray tile roof supported by wooden beams. A green balloon hangs from the beams. The boy in the gray coat stands under the balloon, looking up at it, pointing at it with a wooden stick in his right hand.

[0-2] The boy in the gray coat repeatedly jumps up, pointing the stick in his hand at the balloon. At this time, a man in a white shirt and blue pants walks in from the left side to stand next to the boy in the gray coat.

[0-2] The boy in the gray coat repeatedly jumps up, pointing the stick in his hand at the balloon. At this time, a man in a white shirt and blue pants walks in from the left side to stand next to the boy in the gray coat.

[2-9] The man in the white shirt looks at the balloon and the boy in the gray coat and gestures for him to hand him the stick. The boy stops jumping and gives the stick to the man. The man in white stands under the balloon and pokes the bottom of it with the stick in his right hand. The balloon bursts, showering the man in white with white powder. The boy in the gray coat steps back to the right. The man in white lowers his head and looks at the white powder in his hand, then spreads his hands and looks to the right. He lowers his head again to look at the white powder on himself and moves his legs slightly.
